"Una prueba a las dificultades":
"Hey hey, are you hanging in there?
Then allow big bro to give you a test,
although it'll technically be a request.
You know about time attacks, right?
A mission where the objective is to get
the best possible time you can. This time
attack takes place on planet Lillipa.
You could set a record, and you'll get
a reward from me. Sounds good, yeah?
※Completa en Normal+ con calificación A+."
